name: mikroe.click.spiextend
short_description: SPI Extend Click is a compact add-on board for applications that require extending the SPI communication bus over a long distance. This board features the LTC4332, an SPI slave extender device, from Analog Devices. Using a Â±60V fault protected differential transceiver, the LTC4332 can transmit SPI data, including an interrupt signal, up to 2MHz over two twisted-pair cables.
